value:
What? How do I picture my ideal
marriage?! Well... My husband and I
would always get along, and...$k$pIt'd be nice if we had a little girl.

Everyone keeps asking, but no, I
wasn't summoned in the middle of a
wedding ceremony. $k$pWhere I come from, this uniform is
formal battle dress.

I can move just fine in this dress, so
send me into battle. I just want to
help—with anything that needs doing.

Do you have your eye on anyone?
Just tell me, and I'll use my bow to
turn them your direction.$k$pNo, not really.

Hmm... Compared to my armor...
Ahh, $Nu!
I was just adjusting my dress!

I bring greetings
from $Nf.$k$pAm I headed to a wedding? Er...no.
I guess I can see why you ask...

I think I have what it takes...
For battle, and for love.

I guess training in this dress
gives decent results.

At this rate... Will I find the one
to return my love?

Thanks to all you've done for me,
I can wear this dress with pride.

I am Cordelia. I know, I know! But
don't worry. I can fight just fine in this.
It's not a wedding dress!

I've finished my patrol. I've checked
our supplies, too. I've been looking
for you, $Nu.$k$pWhat? That's not a job for a bride?
Don't kid around. You know I'm a
soldier.$k$pWait.. Is it that you don't want me to
spoil my dress?$k$pI'm right? Er... How embarrassing!
But thanks for the compliment, all the
same.$k$pWell, why not? You've been so nice
to me... I'll try being a bride for you.$k$pHa! You're blushing! How cute.$k$pShall we walk onto the battlefield,
arm-in-arm? Maybe we do make
a good couple...
それっ！
Here I go!
ええっ！？
You'll ruin my dress!
Right in the heart!
You are mine!
Bridal strike!
Pledge your love!
Oh, love...
Heehee...
Well, as you can see, this is just perfect.
I'll prove myself no matter what I'm wearing.
There's a saying: bride in June, groom shall swoon.
In Ylisse, it's tradition to pledge your devotion...to Naga, the divine dragon.
A proposal ought to be done only when the time is right, never sooner.
Someday...someday...I would love to be married in a dress like this.
Will I ever pledge my love to anyone...? We shall see. Until then, I pledge my service to you.
OK.
Be happy.
I will.
Who doesn't admire a stunning bride?
